name: KAUJ2: Pastum Pastum
description:
RUN, JUMP & PUSH YOUR FRIENDS AROUND IN THIS CRAZY PARTY GAME!

Invite your friends for a round of Kauj2: Pastum Pastum, a game in development by a team of passionate Latvian students:

  • Customize your character with more than 70 hats and a wide range of colors;
  • Pick from a selection of various maps to play;
  • Push your friends till they weaken and  fly off the map in Free-for-All;
  • Escape imminent death by climbing to the top in The Floor is Lava;
  • More gamemodes and maps to come...

WHO CAN SCORE THE MOST? CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS IN KAUJ2 AND FIND OUT!

AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD BELOW
